bibl.title: Archaeology in Jordan.
bibl.note: See pp. 531-533: Jaakko FRÖSÉN and Zbigniew T. FIEMA, Petra Scrolls Project. Preliminary report on the 150 or so carbonized Petra papyrus scrolls (VIth century). The publication work will be undertaken jointly by Jaakko FRÖSÉN and Ludwig KOENEN.
bibl.seg: BIKAI Patricia M. and Deborah KOORING, Archaeology in Jordan.

See pp. 531-533: Jaakko FRÖSÉN and Zbigniew T. FIEMA, Petra Scrolls Project. Preliminary report on the 150 or so carbonized Petra papyrus scrolls (VIth century). The publication work will be undertaken jointly by Jaakko FRÖSÉN and Ludwig KOENEN.
